basics.name: Jo Martin
basics.label: Spatial AI, Landscape Evolution
basics.summary: PhD student in the earth sciences with a focus on deep learning for spatial data and landscape evolution

work.name: NuHarbor Security
work.summary: Served as the primary technical resource for infosec teams at clients ranging from state governments to large financial companies.

volunteer.summary: Responsible for maintaing communication between the GSGA Executive Board and the graduate students, as well as creating and maintain institutional knowledge.

awards.title: Outstanding Masters Thesis
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'

publications.name: Guessing Numbers and Extremal Graph Theory
publications.summary: This paper found the extremal number with respect to the prperty of having guessing number greater than and an upper bound on the saturation number for that property.

publications.name: Bridging sustainability science, earth science, and data science through interdisciplinary education
publications.summary: This article provides an overview of required competencies, educational programs and courses that are beginning to emerge, the challenges these pioneering programs face, and lessons learned by participating instructors, in the broader context of sustainability science competencies.
